coreAttributes.authorTag: Discreet stitching reveals this is a product of Naas Emporium
coreAttributes.name: Sheer Chiton
coreAttributes.description: A sheer chiton, a revival of antiquity fashion.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the chiton over [npc.her] head, slipping it over [npc.her] breasts and letting it fall over [npc.her] hips.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the chiton over [npc2.namePos] head, slipping it over [npc2.her] breasts and letting it fall over [npc2.her] hips.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] the chiton over [npc2.namePos] head, roughly [npc.verb(yank)] it over [npc2.her] breasts and lets it fall over [npc2.her] hips.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] [npc.her] chiton off [npc.her] shoulder and [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc.her] hips before shimmying out of it.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] [npc2.namePos] chiton off [npc2.her] shoulder and [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc2.her] hips before helping [npc2.her] shimmy out of it.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] [npc2.namePos] chiton of [npc2.her] shoulder and [npc.verb(yank)] it down over [npc2.her] hips, letting it drop to the floor.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up [npc.her] chiton, covering [npc.her] breasts. Though it does nothing to conceal them.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up [npc2.namePos] chiton, covering [npc2.her] breasts before tightening the buckles. Though it does nothing to conceal them.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(yank)] up [npc2.namePos] chiton, roughly covering [npc2.her] breasts. Though it does nothing to conceal them.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] chiton back into place, covering [npc.her] ass and groin. Though it does nothing to conceal them.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] chiton back into place, covering [npc2.her] ass and groin. Though it does nothing to conceal them.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(yank)] [npc2.namePos] chiton back into place, roughly covering [npc2.her] ass and groin. Though it does nothing to conceal them.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] chiton aside, baring [npc.her] ass and groin.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] chiton aside, baring [npc2.her] ass and groin.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] [npc2.namePos] chiton aside, baring [npc2.her] ass and groin.
